entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming east 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
